author: sandygao
msg: Improved some schema error messages: UPA, General Attribute Checking.

author: andyc
msg: Fixed discrepency between Xerces2 and Xerces 1.x code base -- X2
wasn't reporting the boundaries of the five built-in entities
(e.g. &, etc). Added a feature to allow user to turn it off
but it is on by default for backwards compatibility.

author: lmartin
msg: when cloning elements into a complexType scope from a group, make sure the tree walk handles occurrence range nodes

author: lmartin
msg: generate a better msg for bad attribute in derivation by extension
